prompts: Create a powerful water-type Pokemon with a serpentine body and fierce demeanor.
Imagine a dragon-like creature with blue scales and white fins that commands the sea.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves from a small fish into a massive, intimidating beast.
Design a mythical creature with a long, flowing body and a fierce roar that echoes underwater.
Show me a unique Pokemon that can control storms and has a majestic appearance.
Give me an aquatic Pokemon that can fly gracefully above the water's surface.
Make a Pokemon that has a combination of blue and yellow colors with a fierce expression.
